TEXT_DICT.This: Contains pairs of Strings, used to get values based on keys.

TEXT:
Select Cybernetics to install.
(Credit Cost = Energy Cost)
Requires a Cybernetic card or relic.
EXTRA_TEXT: -Used/Available- NL Install and uninstall #yCybernetics at Rest Sites.
Card mods grant additional effects when played. Cards can have a maximum of #b2 mods.
